introduction: Commons Mass Description is a tool that allows user to describe pictures and multimedia at Wikimedia Commons en masse without having to edit each image manually. You can find more at its Wikimedia Commons page.
introduction-bugs: If you find any bugs in this tool, please feel free to create a task at Wikimedia Phabricator.
you-were-blocked: Your user account has been blocked
option-display-images: Choose a number of displayed images
source-category: Enter name of category that you want to use at the source of the table below
source-uploader: Enter username of uploader which pictures you would like to describe
helptext-uploader: Username, do not include prefix User:
